japanese: え〜〜っ！/でも、早く食べないと/次のがもらえません！
english: Ehhh！/But if you don't eat fast, /you won't get the next one！

japanese: うん！　任せて！/さぁ、シャツかして。
english: Yeah！ Leave it to me!/Now, lend me your shirt.

japanese: ええ。/学園祭の日ぐらい、/保健室の外にも出ないとね。
english: Yes./On festival day, /I should leave the nurse's office.

japanese: うん！/ザキやゆりかさんといると/楽しいよ。
english: Yeah！/Being with Zaki and Yurika-san /is fun.

japanese: ええ、瓦割りはね。/瓦になら思い切り力を/ぶつけられますから……。
english: Yes, tile breaking. /I can put all my power /into breaking tiles…

japanese: うん！/とってもよく似合うよ！
ええ。/文科系クラブの晴れ舞台よね。/みんな頑張ってほしいわ。
english: Yes./It's cultural clubs' big day./I hope everyone does well.
